title: In an Instant
description: In this Dateline classic, Keith Morrison reports on the case of a wife who supposedly died from an allergic reaction to a spray tan. So why was her husband charged with murder? Originally aired on NBC on June 8, 2012.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
